name: Powerdaya Ltd.
description:
Welcome to the Powerdaya quality merchandising unit!

Powerdaya is a subsidiary of Fazbear Entertainment.

Discover the story of the employees of this simple company. It may be due to a certain CEO's actions that have brought our lovely employees to Salt Lake City, but it seems they have brought along their own fun! These busy workers have their own little world that has yet to be discovered, so let’s see what they have in store!

This is a demo for a side project story that takes place within the Bluey Capsules universe. Will eventually be updated with new sprite art.
